description: Retrieves a list that describes one or more specified images, if the image names or image ARNs are provided. Otherwise, all images in the account are described.

parameters.name: Names
parameters.description: The names of the public or private images to describe. (string) ---

parameters.name: Arns
parameters.description: The ARNs of the public, private, and shared images to describe. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Images
nested_items.description: Information about the images.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the image.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image.

nested_items.name: BaseImageArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the image from which this image was created.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The image name to display.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The image starts in the PENDING state. If image creation succeeds, the state is AVAILABLE. If image creation fails, the state is FAILED.

nested_items.name: Visibility
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image is public or private.

nested_items.name: ImageBuilderSupported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether an image builder can be launched from this image.

nested_items.name: ImageBuilderName
nested_items.description: The name of the image builder that was used to create the private image. If the image is shared, this value is null.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The operating system platform of the image.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description to display.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the last state change occurred.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state change reason code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The state change reason message.

nested_items.name: Applications
nested_items.description: The applications associated with the image.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The application name to display.

nested_items.name: IconURL
nested_items.description: The URL for the application icon. This URL might be time-limited.

nested_items.name: LaunchPath
nested_items.description: The path to the application executable in the instance.

nested_items.name: LaunchParameters
nested_items.description: The arguments that are passed to the application at launch.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: If there is a problem, the application can be disabled after image creation.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: WorkingDirectory
nested_items.description: The working directory for the application.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: AppBlockArn
nested_items.description: The app block ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: IconS3Location
nested_items.description: The S3 location of the application icon.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket of the S3 object.

nested_items.name: S3Key
nested_items.description: The S3 key of the S3 object.
SourceS3Location when creating an app block with CUSTOM PackagingType (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

SourceS3Location when creating an app block with APPSTREAM2 PackagingType, and using an existing application package (VHD file). In this case, S3Key refers to the VHD file. If a new application package is required, then S3Key is not required. (Actions: CreateAppBlock)

nested_items.name: Platforms
nested_items.description: The platforms on which the application can run.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InstanceFamilies
nested_items.description: The instance families for the application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the application was created within the app block.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the image was created.

nested_items.name: PublicBaseImageReleasedDate
nested_items.description: The release date of the public base image. For private images, this date is the release date of the base image from which the image was created.

nested_items.name: AppstreamAgentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the AppStream 2.0 agent to use for instances that are launched from this image.

nested_items.name: ImagePermissions
nested_items.description: The permissions to provide to the destination AWS account for the specified image.

nested_items.name: allowFleet
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for a fleet.

nested_items.name: allowImageBuilder
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image can be used for an image builder.

nested_items.name: ImageErrors
nested_items.description: Describes the errors that are returned when a new image can't be created.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message.

nested_items.name: ErrorTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time the error occurred.

nested_items.name: LatestAppstreamAgentVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image is using the latest AppStream 2.0 agent version or not.

nested_items.name: SupportedInstanceFamilies
nested_items.description: The supported instances families that determine which image a customer can use when the customer launches a fleet or image builder. The following instances families are supported:
General Purpose.
Compute Optimized.
Memory Optimized.
Graphics.
Graphics Design.
Graphics Pro.
Graphics G4
Graphics G5

nested_items.name: DynamicAppProvidersEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether dynamic app providers are enabled within an AppStream 2.0 image or not.

nested_items.name: ImageSharedWithOthers
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the image is shared with another account ID.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
